Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We have now identified a missense mutation , a splice - donor mutation , and a frameshift mutation in the coding region of SCN5A in three IVF families .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| missense mutation |
| splice - donor mutation |
| frameshift mutation |

Note: These are not diseases, but rather genetic mutations that can lead to diseases. The paragraph mentions that these mutations have been identified in the coding region of the SCN5A gene in three IVF families, but it does not specify the disease(s) associated with these mutations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| missense mutation |
| frameshift mutation |

The term "splice - donor mutation" does not clearly refer to a disease, so it has been removed from the list.
